scripts.docker: vite build --mode docker && rm -r ../gogoscrum-docker/gogoscrum-web-client/dist && cp -r dist/ ../gogoscrum-docker/gogoscrum-web-client/dist
scripts.test: vite build --mode docker && ssh root@47.99.45.135 'rm -Rf /root/gogoscrum-test-docker/gogoscrum-web-client/dist/*' && rsync -rvhe ssh dist root@47.99.45.135:/root/gogoscrum-test-docker/gogoscrum-web-client
scripts.demo: vite build --mode docker && ssh root@47.99.45.135 'rm -Rf /root/gogoscrum-demo-docker/gogoscrum-web-client/dist/*' && rsync -rvhe ssh dist root@47.99.45.135:/root/gogoscrum-demo-docker/gogoscrum-web-client
scripts.stage: vite build --mode docker && ssh root@47.96.191.34 'rm -Rf /root/gogoscrum-stage-docker/gogoscrum-web-client/dist/*' && rsync -rvhe ssh dist root@47.96.191.34:/root/gogoscrum-stage-docker/gogoscrum-web-client
